member.name: M:Dec.DiscordIPC.Core.LowLevelDiscordIPC.InitAsync
member.summary: Initializes the IPC client. Use this before calling any other methods.

member.name: M:Dec.DiscordIPC.Core.LowLevelDiscordIPC.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the client. Use when the client is no longer in use.

member.name: T:Dec.DiscordIPC.DiscordIPC
member.summary: The main access point for user programs to use DiscordIPC.

member.name: M:Dec.DiscordIPC.DiscordIPC.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.remarks: Does not actually initialize the client. Use after this to initialize the client.
member.param: If true, DiscordIPC logs every JSON sent and received to the console.

member.name: T:Dec.DiscordIPC.ErrorResponseException
member.summary: Exception thrown when IPC returns an error response.
